name: Harvest Planner
description:
Planning your time in Harvest can be tough if you don't have edit access and your calendar has some extra meetings that are not reflected in it. I created a simple Harvest builder so you can send a rejigged Harvest week to your PMs for a better visual representation of your workload. Hopefully this will kickstart and speed up the discussion.


Added some extra flair with yellow-bordered buttons that mark time slots of which you don't know anything about.
